title: Coding From Zero

Hereâ€™s a basic description for your repository:

CodingFromZero is a beginner-friendly Python learning resource designed to guide users through coding fundamentals. The repository contains practical exercises, examples, and walkthroughs aimed at building problem-solving skills in Python. With a structured progression from basic to intermediate concepts, this project provides an immersive learning experience for those starting their programming journey.
